description: A dataset for predicting customer churn in telecom or subscription-based services, widely applied in business analytics.

variables.meaning: The column 'CreditScore' contains data of type numerical. It represents the CreditScore of the observation.
The column 'Geography' contains data of type categorical. It represents the Geography of the observation.
The column 'Gender' contains data of type categorical. It represents the Gender of the observation.
The column 'Age' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Age of the observation.
The column 'Tenure' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Tenure of the observation.
The column 'Balance' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Balance of the observation.
The column 'NumOfProducts' contains data of type numerical. It represents the NumOfProducts of the observation.
The column 'HasCrCard' contains data of type numerical. It represents the HasCrCard of the observation.
The column 'IsActiveMember' contains data of type numerical. It represents the IsActiveMember of the observation.
The column 'EstimatedSalary' contains data of type numerical. It represents the EstimatedSalary of the observation.
The column 'Exited' contains data of type categorical. It represents the Exited of the observation.
